name: BayKing
description:
You're new in downtown Zone, life is hard but you got donuts on your side ! Ho, here's your first client... Make him a donut, and try not to overcook it !

=====

  1. Grab a tool and cut or smash your ingredient !
  2. Put what you need in the Big Bad Bowl
  3. Take the donut dough and put it in the oven
  4. Cook your donut and serve
  5. You can refill your ingredient by clicking on the chains, then repeat !

There is a help button in game if you are lost !

=====

This game was created in two days for the Mini Jam 94 ! The theme was "baking" and the limitation was "no more than two buttons"

Programmers :

  • Elioth Bénard
  • Quentin Ferragu
  • Vincent Debuissy

Graphic Artists :

  • Simon Garnier

Musics :

  • Kevin Macleod (Main theme)
